bibl.title: Babylonian Crescent Observation and Ptolemaic-Roman Lunar Dates.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Deduction of an empirical crescent visibility line. - Previous work on Egyptian lunar dates of the Ptolemaic and Roman periods. - The lunar cycle of pCarlsberg 9 [P. Carlsberg 9 (= LDAB 55987)]. - Ptolemaic and Roman lunar dates. - Analysis of Ptolemaic and Roman lunar dates. - Appendix 1. Observed old crescents in astronomical diaries 1-3 and 5-6; - Appendix 2. Comments on observed new crescents in astronomical diaries 1-3 and 5-6. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: PalArch's Journal of Archaeology of Egypt / Egyptology

bibl.seg: Rolf Krauss, with a contribution by Victor Reijs, Babylonian Crescent Observation and Ptolemaic-Roman Lunar Dates.
PalArch's Journal of Archaeology of Egypt / Egyptology 9, 5 (2012) 95 pp., 62 tabl., 28 figg.

Introduction. - Deduction of an empirical crescent visibility line. - Previous work on Egyptian lunar dates of the Ptolemaic and Roman periods. - The lunar cycle of pCarlsberg 9 [P. Carlsberg 9 (= LDAB 55987)]. - Ptolemaic and Roman lunar dates. - Analysis of Ptolemaic and Roman lunar dates. - Appendix 1. Observed old crescents in astronomical diaries 1-3 and 5-6; - Appendix 2. Comments on observed new crescents in astronomical diaries 1-3 and 5-6. - Avec résumé en anglais.
